Html:
I have successfully installedÂ CSD and I am able to see and create new ConfigurationSectionDesigner project and add new Configuration Section Designer item in the existing project.
But when I open the .csd file there is no component in the toolbox.
Please help me out.

Right click your toolbox and choose "Show All". Does the "Configuration Section Designer" group show up somewhere in there? If not, I suggest you uninstall the tool and then install it again. Make sure you are not running any instances of Visual Studio while you're installing. I hope that helps.
